venue.name: Horse Hill Nature Preserve, just past

item.description:
Here is a link to a PDF description and map of the nature preserve:  http://www.hhnp.org/Documents/Brochure.pdf

Here is a  link to what the preserve is and how it came about in the town of Merrimack, NH:

http://www.merrimacknh.gov/dpw/parks_maintenance/parks/horse_hill_nature_preserve
item.how_to_find_us: We will gather just a short distance down the trial head in order to get the dogs away from the road way. The hike will start at approximately 11:10 AM or sooner if there are no late arrivals.
item.why: The hike is taking place on Sunday Feb. 20, 2011 at 11:00 AM

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: A 3.9 mile hike doing the loop trail (trail markers 1-12) of the preserve.
